Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Asexual \A*sex"u*al\ (?; 135), a. [Pref. a- not + sexual.] 1. (Biol.) Having no distinct sex; without sexual action; as, asexual reproduction. See {Fission} and {Gemmation}. [1913 Webster]
2. not involving sexual activity or sexual attraction; as, an asexual friendship. [PJC]
asexual adj : not havning or involving sex; "an asexual spore"; "asexual reproduction" [syn: {nonsexual}] [ant: {sexual}]
